nodes.text: Dalgeer was a Sullustan man, who was a member of the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War.

Dalgeer originally worked as a corporate security officer. However, he was unable to cope with his employers' allegiance to the Galactic Empire, so he joined the Rebel Alliance and became a Commander in the Alliance Military. When the Alliance needed a competant commander for an outpost on the volcano Mount Deldarca, Dalgeer vounteered for the assignment. The base eventually became known as Dalgeer's Rim.
Dalgeer was energetic and outspoken. He was very willing to tell people his opinions on everything.
